{{ record.callUpEnd }} {{ record.cpfReferenceMonth }} {{ record.returnStatus }} {{ record.returnStatus }} import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'n2-company-pre-populated-eclaim-tab', templateUrl: './company-pre-populated-eclaim-tab.component.html', styleUrls: ['./company-pre-populated-eclaim-tab.component.scss'] }) export class CompanyPrePopulatedEclaimTabComponent implements OnInit { displayRecordDialog: any = { display: false }; sampleData = [ { sentDate: "04-09-2021", name:"S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", callUpStart: "04-09-2021 (0800)", callUpEnd: "29-09-2021 (1800)", cpfReferenceMonth: "09-2021", returnStatus: "" }, { sentDate: "04-07-2021", name:"S1234567B Lim Ah Seng", callUpStart: "04-07-2021 (0800)", callUpEnd: "29-07-2021 (1800)", cpfReferenceMonth: "07-2021", returnStatus: "E20-1024" }, { sentDate: "05-05-2021", name:"S1234567C Goh Ah Beng", callUpStart: "05-05-2021 (0800)", callUpEnd: "24-05-2021 (1800)", cpfReferenceMonth: "05-2021", returnStatus: "E17-1024" }, { sentDate: "04-03-2021", name:"S1234567A Tan Ah Kow", callUpStart: "04-03-2021 (0800)", callUpEnd: "22-03-2021 (1800)", cpfReferenceMonth: "03-2021", returnStatus: "Deleted by Employer" } ] constructor() { // to do } ngOnInit(): void { // to do } exportCSV(): void { // to do } onOpen(dialog: any): void { dialog.display = true; } }
